product_name: CamelBak L.U.X.E. NV Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz. - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The women's L.U.X.E. NV hydration pack boasts a fully ventilated back panel for total comfort, plus generous capacity and a 100 fl. oz. reservoir for all-day mountain biking sessions.
short_description: The women's L.U.X.E. NV hydration pack boasts a fully ventilated back panel for total comfort, plus generous capacity and a 100 fl. oz. reservoir for all-day mountain biking sessions.
